alert.note: Alert for Annette Island; City and Borough of Sitka; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Prince of Wales Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 5:09AM AKST until March 01 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW THROUGH WEDNESDAY... A storm force low over northern gulf coast will stall out during the day on Wednesday. Temperatures currently below freezing with dewpoints in the 20s will rise through the day. Snowfall amounts of 5 to 8 inches have been reported over the northern inner channels and portions of the central inner channels early Wednesday morning. Some uncertainty remains regarding snow totals for the southern half of the panhandle as southerly flow will cause a mix of rain/snow or even a complete change to rain through Wednesday evening. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Eastern gulf coast and southern inner channels. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to mix or change to rain midday Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Annette Island; City and Borough of Sitka; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Prince of Wales Island
